message:
A Short Profile of the Abducted Student of Islamic University Al Mukaddas

Name - Al Mukaddas
Father - Abdul Halim
Mother - Ayesha Siddiqa
Address - Village: Kuniari, Thana: Pirozpur, District: Pirozpur
Session - 2005-2006
Department - Al Fiqh
Roll - 0519038
Hall - Room No. 211 (International Block), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall
Activities –
•	CEO of Naval Wing, BNCC IU
•	Senior Member- Islamic University Debating Club.
•	Vice President of Barisal District Student Welfare Association, IU.
•	He was widely popular in campus for cultural activities and qualities
